Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' occurrences across all cases
Percentage of process variants that include 'Accepted + Wait' compared to variants containing 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Number of times 'Accepted + Wait' directly precedes 'Completed + Resolved'
Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' that appears before 'Completed + In Call' in any variant
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in variants where 'Completed + In Call' is absent
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' does not occur

Name: Ratio of 'Accepted + Wait' occurrences to 'Accepted + Wait - User' occurrences
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Accepted + Wait'

Name: Percentage of total case duration attributable to waiting periods initiated by 'Accepted + Wait' (based on VINST incident management context)
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Number of variants in which 'Accepted + Wait' is followed by 'Completed + Closed' without intermediate 'Completed + In Call'
Percentage of cases containing 'Accepted + Wait' that never reach 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases where 'Completed + In Call' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' appearing after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' in high-frequency variants
Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' executions relative to all 'Accepted +' prefixed activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Accepted + Wait' occurs in the same case as 'Completed + In Call', regardless of order
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + In Call' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Accepted + In Progress' that eventually include 'Accepted + Wait' but exclude 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait' out of all cases where 'Completed + In Call' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases originating from France versus other countries (leveraging org:group and country columns from VINST log)
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait' activities grouped by the last value of organization country
